sentences.sContent: Would you mind if I closed the window?
sentences.sCn: 我把窗户关上你不介意吧？

sentences.sContent: Let me do the car door – it won’t close properly.
sentences.sCn: 我来修一下车门，它关不紧。

sentences.sContent: Beth closed her eyes and tried to sleep.
She heard the door close behind her.
sentences.sCn: 她听见门在她身后关上了。

sentences.sContent: I will now close the meeting by asking you to join me in a final toast.
sentences.sCn: 现在我要请大家最后干一杯来结束这次会议。

sentences.sContent: ...He knew my love for yoga and had seen a space close to where he lived that he thought might be good to serve as a yoga studio...
...They were very close together and there was a lot of noise and movements...
...If the teacher develops close relationships with the students...
...but if you were talking to another person and they came up close in your personal space...
...You go home to your house and your garden and you close the door...
...or if a close relative has had one...
...and come as close as we can to the ideal...
...so it isn't really very close to Amitsville at all and it's a long drive...
...Philadelphia came close to passing a 2-cents-per-ounce soda tax...
...and new job growth has fallen close to zero...
